title: Aromatherapy
description: Essential oils are the concentrated essence of an herb, flower, leaf, seed, root or bark and are high in that plant's life force energy. cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Essential oils are the concentrated essence of an herb, flower, leaf, seed, root or bark and are high in that plant's life force energy. The history and use of each essential oil has been recorded and tested over many generations. Essential oils are rejuvenating, pleasing to our sense of smell and are also known to have wonderful benefits on many levels.
